name: Autoignite
body:
**Name:** AutoIgnite

**Description:** Allows placed TNT to automatically ignite if the player who placed it has permissions.

**Permissions:**
    autoignite: Allows a player to use AutoIgnite

**Commands:** None

**Download:** http://kanoa.ca/uploads/AutoIgnite-1.1.jar
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
